name: Tied Out
description:
You and your worst enemy are tied up with ropes, and you need to get out somehow. Your goal is to kill him, not kill yourself. Try your best!

Controls:

  • Hold W to make a dash forward or S to make a dash backward
  • Use A and D to turn around

UPD: Yeah, there is only 1 level in the game! I joined jam pretty late, so haven't managed to add more! But i hope that first level is fun enough xd
